location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to Major Robert Taylor, Political Agent at Basra, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Taylor's previous letter of 17 June 1825, in which Taylor communicated the failure of his mediation with the Pacha [Pasha] of Baghdad, on behalf of the Imam of Muscat [Sa‘id bin Sulṭān al-Sa‘id], and the precautions taken for the security of Bussorah [Basra] should hostilities occur.
